#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

#define sf(a) scanf("%d",&a)

int arr[100001];
 
 
int main()
{
int tc,number_rods,market_price,cutting_cost;
int i,j,k;
int cost,maxcost;
int len;
int key;
int num_pieces,cuts,tempmaxcost;
 
sf(tc);
 
while(tc--)
{
sf(number_rods);
sf(market_price);
sf(cutting_cost);
 
cost=0;
 
maxcost=0;
 
for(i=0;i<number_rods;i++)
sf(arr[i]);
 
sort(arr,arr+number_rods);
 
for(len=1;len<=arr[number_rods-1];len++)
{
tempmaxcost=0;
 
for(i=0;i<number_rods;i++)
{
cost = 0;
 
if(arr[i]>=len)
{
num_pieces = arr[i]/len;
 
if(arr[i]%len==0)
{
cuts = (arr[i]/len) - 1;
cost = (arr[i]*market_price) - (cuts*cutting_cost);
}
else
{
cuts=(arr[i]/len);
cost = (num_pieces*len*market_price) - (cuts*cutting_cost);
}
 
 
 
if(cost>0)
tempmaxcost += cost;
}
}
 
 
 
if(tempmaxcost>maxcost)
{
maxcost = tempmaxcost;
}
}
 
cout<<maxcost<<endl;
 
}
 
return 0;
}
